prediction.overall_explanation: The contract implements a secure veNFT system with proper access controls, reentrancy guards on state-changing functions, and standard checkpointing for decaying balances. Permanent locks are handled correctly without double-counting via slope adjustments and global permanent tracking. Merging, splitting, and delegation logic prevents unauthorized actions and maintains supply integrity. No concrete exploits found; protections like ownership_change mitigate same-block abuses. Design choices like voting power jumps on permanent lock are intentional and non-exploitable.
